summary: An email from March 4, 2021, containing screenshots of a Facebook profile, expressing concern that the profile owner may be associated with pedophiles and has many photos of children. The email is addressed to the FBI New York field office.

persons.name: Josephine
persons.role: Facebook friend of the subject profile
persons.context: Appears as a 'friend' on the Facebook profile screenshots included in the email.

events.title: Email to FBI with Facebook screenshots
events.description: An individual sends an email to the FBI's New York field office containing screenshots of a Facebook profile, expressing suspicion that the profile owner associates with pedophiles and has many photos of children.

keyFacts: An email was sent to the FBI New York field office on March 4, 2021, regarding a suspicious Facebook profile.
The sender expresses concern that the profile owner 'hangs out with pedophiles' and that their Facebook is 'full of children.'
The email includes multiple image attachments (IMG_2593.jpg through IMG_2600.jpg, IMG_2643.jpg) which appear to be screenshots of the Facebook profile and its friends list.
The Facebook profile shown has a friend named 'Josephine.'
The document references internal Epstein case file numbers (EFTA00099835 through EFTA00099843), indicating it was part of that investigation.
